participant_1.background:
I am of mixed race and I am proud of my heritage.
I keep my blue and hazel eyes open and take mental notes of the world around me.
I collect cosplay props to bring my favorite characters to life.
My family is important to me, and I like to share stories about them with my children.
I'm struggling with school but I'm happy with my family.

content.text: Hi! I'm doing well. It's a beautiful day outside.
I agree! It's a perfect day for a walk.
I love taking walks. I always find it so relaxing.
Me too. I love to people watch and listen to the birds.
That sounds nice. I like to walk with my dog, but he always wants to go faster than me.
Haha, I know what you mean. My dog is always pulling me along.
What kind of dog do you have?
I have a golden retriever named Buddy. He's the sweetest dog ever.
Oh, I love golden retrievers! They're so gentle and friendly.
He really is. He's the perfect dog for me.
I'm glad you have such a good friend.
Me too. He makes my life so much better.
